Package it.unipd.dei.yourwaytoitaly.database

Provides access to the underlying database.
Since:
1.00
Version:
1.00
Author:
Vittorio Esposito, Marco Basso, Matteo Piva, Francesco Giurisato
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDAO
    Abstract DAO class to be extended
    AdvertisementDAO
    Class for: inserting an Advertisement, editing some parameters of an Advertisement, searching an Advertisement by ID_ADVERTISEMENT, searching and returning some Advertisements by ID_CITY, ID_TYPE and DATE_START inside the database
    BookingDAO
    Class for: inserting a Booking, editing some parameters of a Booking, searching and returning some Bookings by ID_ADVERTISEMENT, searching and returning some Bookings by EMAIL_T inside the database
    CityDAO
    Class for: searching and returning a city by ID_CITY, searching and returning a city by NAME inside the database
    FeedbackDAO
    Class for: inserting a Feedback, editing some parameters of a Feedback, searching and returning some Feedback by ID_ADVERTISEMENT, searching and returning some Feedback by EMAIL_T inside the database
    ImageDAO
    Class for: inserting an Image, deleting an Image, searching and returning some Images by ID_ADVERTISEMENT inside the database
    TypeAdvertisementDAO
    Class for: searching and returning a TypeAdvertisement by ID_TYPE, searching and returning a TypeAdvertisement by TYPE inside the database
    UserDAO
    UserDAO.java Class for: inserting a User (company/tourist) editing a User (company/tourist) searching and returning a User (company/tourist) by EMAIL_T and PASSWORD returning the score accumulated by a User (Tourist) inside the database
